text: Samuel Wright Bodman III (November 26, 1938 - September 7, 2018) was an American politician. He was the 11th United States Secretary of Energy. He was previously the Deputy Secretary of the Treasury and the Deputy Secretary of Commerce. Bodman died in El Paso, Texas on September 7, 2018 at the age of 79.Statement from Secretary Perry on the passing of Samuel W. Bodman The cause of death was complications from primary progressive aphasia.Samuel W. Bodman, 79; former Fidelity executive served as US energy secretary ==References== ==Other websites== * Samuel Bodman's political donations Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from primary progressive aphasia Category:United States Secretaries of Energy Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Samuel Bodman
